LanguageData.Plant_TreeWillow.label: 柳
LanguageData.Plant_TreeWillow.description: 美しくて、厚い、最も早く伸びる日陰樹の一つです。使えそうな材木は得られません。
LanguageData.Plant_TreeCypress.label: 糸杉
LanguageData.Plant_TreeCypress.description: A tall coniferous tree often found in swamps. Despite its slow growth, planting these trees can be profitable as a low-effort, long-term investment because they yield so much usable wood.
LanguageData.Plant_TreeMaple.label: 楓
LanguageData.Plant_TreeMaple.description: A common medium-sized tree, easily identifiable by its distinct three-pointed leaf.
LanguageData.Plant_Chokevine.label: チョークバイン
LanguageData.Plant_Chokevine.description: Tangled masses of cord-like, spiky vines which coil in great masses along the ground. Chokevine greatky slows down anyone who moves over it. Multiple tribes have independently generated stories of chokevine strangling children to death in the night, as a way to scare kids into coming home before dark.
